Injustice:
 
"Don't doubt me!  I may be a clone, but I am not incompetent!  I have a plan, so don't worry about me!" Injustice snapped.
He did not like being talked down to, not by anyone.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Darkfate:

"would be wise go to Maximal base??"hissed the male"remember that 
they won't apreciate us and neither when we destroyed their precious 
cannon... I just tell it 'cause I think that you have a grat future 
with us and afailure won't please Unicron"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Injustice:
>  
> "We should split into two groups.  One will go to investigate the 
cannon site, the other will trek toward the Maximal base and scout 
it out, in case the renegades are there.  Darkfate will come with 
me, you two will be the other team.  Now, who wants to go check the 
maximal base?"
